My best friend used it for her hair and she swore by it. After a couple years of using it her hair started to be really dry and she had to stop using it and cut a lot of her hair because nothing helped. It may be working for you but it could be a disaster for someone else.  I used it as a face moisturizer for a while and i got really bad acne (i have never had acne this bad before, just a few pimples). It was really bad. I used it also as a body mositurizer in that time and my skin never looked worse. Dry patches all over it and looking really gross. I have never cooked with coconut oil but i have read a few articles that wete saying that for the health is as bad as   using animal fat maybe even worse. ğŸ˜€

I donâ€™t wear a lot of makeup when traveling, so I just make my own bb cream type product. Take a small travel container and squirt some of your moisturizer and foundation inside, then mix it up.
